      public void saveShopDetails(Shop shop1)

    • addItem

      public void addItem()
      Adds a new item to the list of items and writes the updated list to a JSON file. The item is created based on user input for item ID, item name, unit price, and quantity.

    • deserialize

      public void deserialize()
      Deserializes a JSON file containing a list of products and prints each product's details.

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem()
      Deletes an item from the inventory based on the item ID entered by the user. Reads the items from a JSON file "items.json" using Gson library, searches for the item with the given ID, removes it from the list and writes the updated list back to the file.

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice()
      Updates the unit price of a product by its ID Prompts user to enter the item ID of the product to update. Prompts user to enter the new price. Reads the "items.json" file and converts the content to a list of products. Loops through the list of products and finds the product with matching ID. Updates the unit price of the found product. Writes the updated list of products to the "items.json" file. Handles and logs any IOExceptions that might occur during the reading and writing process.

    • setHeader

      public void setHeader(Shop shop)

    • loadData

      public void loadData()
